versos: (toes) Daniel 2:33 - "its legs of iron, its feet partly of iron and partly of baked clay.";;;

(censer) "Take the censer and put fire in it from the altar, put incense on it, and take it quickly to the congregation and make atonement for them; for wrath has gone out from the Lord. The plague has begun." - Numbers 16:46 NKJV;;;
(uncover) Isaiah 47:2 - "Take millstones and grind meal; remove your veil, strip off your robe, uncover your legs, pass through the rivers.";;;
(bewail) Ezekiel 32:16 - This is the lamentation wherewith they shall lament.;;;
(befallen) Job 3:25 - "For the thing which I greatly feared is come upon me, and that which I was afraid of is come unto me.";;;
(cheweth) Proverbs 17:22 - "A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones.";;;
(cud) Leviticus 11:3 - "You may eat any animal that has a divided hoof and that chews the cud.";;;
(divideth) Luke 11:17 - "But he, knowing their thoughts, said to them, 'Every kingdom divided against itself is laid waste, and a divided household falls.'";;;
(eagle) "But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint." - Isaiah 40:31 NIV;;;
(bald) Leviticus 13:40 - "But if a man has a bald head or is bald, he is clean.";;;
(beareth) 1 Corinthians 13:7 - "beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.";;;
(cleansed) Psalm 51:7 - "Cleanse me with hyssop, and I will be clean; wash me, and I will be whiter than snow.";;;
(drunk) Ephesians 5:18 - "Do not get drunk on wine, which leads to debauchery. Instead, be filled with the Spirit.";;;
(defile) Leviticus 18:20 - "You shall not have sexual relations with your neighbors wife and defile yourself with her.";;;

(rising) Matthew 16:21 - "From that time on Jesus began to explain to his disciples that he must go to Jerusalem and suffer many things at the hands of the elders, the chief priests and the teachers of the law, and that he must be killed and on the third day be raised to life.";;;
(ataroth) Joshua 16:2 - "It went on from Bethel to Luz, passed along to the border of the Archites at ataroth,";;;
